project_info.name: LuxeAI Studio
project_info.description: A Generative AI application combining Computer Vision and Multimodal models for luxury brand marketing.

red_carpet_transformation.title: 紅毯巨星合成 (Red Carpet Template Swap)
red_carpet_transformation.description: Replaces a specific character in a template while preserving others and generating a branded backdrop.

process_steps.details: Uses Google Search tool to find the official logo URL for the user-provided company name.
Converts User Image, Template Image, and Spring Trees Logo to Base64 strings.

character_replacement.action: Replace face and body based on user input
character_replacement.lighting_integration: Apply strong direct flash, match scene exposure/contrast, and cast realistic shadows on the carpet.

character_preservation.instruction: Do not change face or body of locked targets.

background_branding.action: Generate branding on solid black wall
background_branding.pattern_type: Staggered / Half-drop / Brick Pattern (強制交錯)
background_branding.layout_logic: Logos must be offset by 50% on alternate rows (Brick laying style). Solid Black Background.

brand_interaction.title: 品牌互動 (Commercial Card Generator)
brand_interaction.description: Generates a 3D rendered high-end commercial card merging user photo with dynamically inferred brand products.

inputs.brand_name: Text input (Determines product type e.g. Kagome->Ketchup)

process_steps.details: User provides brand name, slogan, footer text, and selects an image (Upload or Camera).

logic_rules.branding: Use Google Search to retrieve brand visual identity and main product line.
logic_rules.product_inference: Automatically determine product from brand name (e.g. Horoyoi -> Alcohol).

clothing_strategy.Male: Suit or Crisp Shirt. Vibe: Professional, Clean, Fresh.
clothing_strategy.Female: Evening Gown or Dress. Style: Elevated version of original outfit.

logic_rules.constraints: Max 4 product items in the scene.
logic_rules.composition: 3:4 Aspect Ratio. Logo at top center. Products in foreground.

getting_started: Click the 'Select API Key' button to authorize via Google AI Studio (Paid key required for Veo/Imagen features).
Select a mode from the landing page: '紅毯巨星' or '品牌互動'.
operating_steps_red_carpet: 1. Enter the Brand Name (e.g., CHANEL, TESLA).
2. Choose your image source: Click '上傳照片' to pick a file, OR '相機拍攝' to use your webcam.
3. (Optional) Select specific Gender, Body Type, or Dress Style.
5. Wait for the AI to search for the logo and generate the image (approx. 10-20 seconds).
6. Preview the result with the alternating logo wall and character swap.
operating_steps_brand_interaction: 1. Enter the Brand Name (e.g., Horoyoi, Kagome).
2. Enter Header Text (Slogan) and Footer Text.
3. Choose your image source: Click '上傳照片' to pick a file, OR '相機拍攝' to use your webcam.
4. If using camera: Align your hand to naturally hold a product and capture.
6. AI will automatically identify the brand product and generate the card using your slogan.
